TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MethodInvoker extends System.MulticastDelegate
type MethodInvoker = delegate of unit -> unit

summary.span: 表示委派，這項委派可執行 Managed 程式碼中任何宣告為 void 且不採用任何參數的方法。

span.span: Represents a delegate that can execute any method in managed code that is declared void and takes no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供用來叫用的方法具有 void 參數清單的簡單委派。 provides a simple delegate that is used to invoke a method with a void parameter list. 進行呼叫的控制項時，可以使用此委派方法，或當您需要簡單委派，但不是想要一個自行定義。This delegate can be used when making calls to a control's method, or when you need a simple delegate but do not want to define one yourself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用呼叫更新應用程式表單的標題列的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to call a method that updates the title bar of the application form. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.methodinvoker/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.methodinvoker/vb/form1.vb#1)]
